name: Automate creation of Blogs for LinkedIn

parts.text:
Write an article about {{1.`3`}} including subtitle that use markup for formatting. Dont output the h1 title. Remove any html reference and keep it in plain text with correct formatting and paragraph breaks. Make the article feel human and mildly humorous.
Keep the length of the article below 2500 words

spec.help: You get this from the 'Upload a File' module.
spec.name: file_uri
spec.label: File URI

nested.help: For example, `urn:li:person:1234`. Only mention someone with a connection to the authenticated user.
nested.name: urn
nested.label: Entity URN

parts.text:
Write an article for facebook about {{1.`3`}} including subtitle that use markup for formatting. Dont output the h1 title. Remove any html reference and keep it in plain text with correct formatting and paragraph breaks. Make the article feel human and mildly humorous.
Keep the length of the article below 2500 words

spec.help: You get this from the 'Upload a File' module.
spec.name: file_uri
spec.label: File URI
